_comment: Tour Configuration - Edit the title and description text below
_instructions: Modules can use phases: intro (before setup), review (after review mode starts), test (after test mode starts), cardBack (after card is flipped). Or use simple array format for basic tours.

intro.title: Welcome to Flashcards!
intro.description: Study vocabulary with interactive flashcards. Click cards to flip between the word and translation.

intro.title: Voice Practice Mode
intro.description: Enable this to practice speaking! You'll be able to record your pronunciation and compare it with native audio.

intro.title: Choose Translation Language
intro.description: For Maranao and Sinama, select whether you want to see English or Cebuano translations on the card backs.

intro.title: Click to Flip Cards
intro.description: Click any card to flip it and reveal the back side. Let me find a card with notes to show you...

cardBack.title: The Card Back
cardBack.description: This is the back of a flashcard. It shows the translation and any notes for this word.

cardBack.title: Target Language
cardBack.description: The word in the language you're learning, along with any pronunciation or usage notes.

cardBack.title: Translation
cardBack.description: The translation in your chosen language (English or Cebuano). Notes provide additional context.

cardBack.title: Navigation Controls
cardBack.description: Use Previous/Next to move between pages, or Restart to go back to the beginning. You can also use arrow keys!

intro.title: Welcome to Picture Match!
intro.description: Test your vocabulary by matching words with their corresponding pictures.

intro.title: Choose Your Mode
intro.description: Review Mode: Practice until you master each word (repeats multiple times). Test Mode: One chance per word with a final score.

intro.title: Review Repetitions
intro.description: In Review Mode, set how many times you need to match each word correctly before it's considered mastered (default: 3 times).

review.title: Track Your Progress
review.description: Watch your progress bar fill up as you correctly match more words!

review.title: Words to Match
review.description: These are the words you need to match. Click on a word to select it.

review.title: Pictures
review.description: After selecting a word, click the matching picture. Lines will connect your matches!

review.title: Review Mode Active
review.description: In Review Mode, you'll keep practicing until you've matched each word correctly the required number of times. Now let's look at Test Mode...

test.title: Test Mode
test.description: You're now in Test Mode! Each word appears only once, and your final score is tracked.

test.title: Score Tracking
test.description: In Test Mode, your correct and incorrect matches are counted. Try to get them all right!

test.title: Ready to Practice?
test.description: Click Start anytime to begin a new round. Good luck!

intro.title: Welcome to Audio Match!
intro.description: Listen to audio and match it with the correct picture. This helps develop your listening skills!

intro.title: Choose Your Mode
intro.description: Review Mode: Keep practicing each word until you master it. Test Mode: One attempt per word with scoring.

intro.title: Review Repetitions
intro.description: Set how many correct matches needed before a word is mastered in Review Mode.

review.title: Listen to the Audio
review.description: Audio plays automatically. Click the speaker icon to replay. Listen carefully to the word!

review.title: Match the Picture
review.description: Click the picture that matches what you hear. A line will connect your selection.

review.title: Progress Tracker
review.description: See how many words you've successfully matched!

review.title: Review Mode Active
review.description: In Review Mode, keep matching until you've mastered each word. Now let's see Test Mode...

test.title: Test Mode
test.description: You're now in Test Mode! Listen carefully - each audio plays only once per word.

test.title: Your Score
test.description: Track your correct and incorrect matches. Aim for a perfect score!

test.title: Start Listening!
test.description: Click Start to begin. Good luck with your listening practice!

intro.title: Welcome to Unsa Ni?
intro.description: "Unsa Ni?" means "What is this?" in Cebuano. Type the correct word for each picture!

intro.title: Select Mode
intro.description: Review Mode: Practice with spaced repetition until mastered. Test Mode: Go through all cards once with scoring.

review.title: Picture Display
review.description: Look at the picture and think of the word in your target language.

review.title: Type Your Answer
review.description: Enter the word in the input field and press Enter or click Submit. The system accepts multiple correct spellings!

review.title: Review Mode Active
review.description: In Review Mode, words you miss will come back for more practice. Now let's see Test Mode...

test.title: Test Mode
test.description: You're now in Test Mode! Each word appears once, and you'll see your final score at the end.

test.title: Score Tracking
test.description: In Test Mode, see your correct and incorrect counts here as you progress.

test.title: Ready to Test?
test.description: Click Start to begin the quiz. Type carefully and good luck!

rec.title: Welcome to Voice Recorder!
rec.description: This tool lets you record, upload, or select audio files for vocabulary cards.

rec.title: Select Language
rec.description: Choose which language you want to work with (Cebuano, Maranao, or Sinama).

rec.title: Translation Language
rec.description: For Maranao and Sinama, select whether you want to see English or Cebuano translations.

rec.title: Search Cards
rec.description: Quickly find specific words by typing in the search box.

rec.title: Filter by Lesson
rec.description: Filter cards to show only a specific lesson range.

rec.title: Audio Cards Table
rec.description: Click on any audio badge to open the recording modal. Badges show the word variant and current audio status.

rec.title: Save Your Changes
rec.description: After recording or assigning audio files, don't forget to click Save Changes to update the manifest!
